@comment: English translation (also used as default translation)

workArea.@comment: The list of the work area available

saveScriptModal.title: Save the script with the following name:

clearScriptModal.title: Are you sure to clear the current script ?

configureKeyboardButtonModal.title: Enter the name(s) of the button (use the comma to separate several names)

resetKeyboardModal.title: Are you sure to clear the current xTouch configuration ?

gyroSensorTab.xAxis: x is the front-back tilt in degrees where front is positive (also known as 'beta' with 'Portrait' orientation)
gyroSensorTab.yAxis: y is the left-right tilt in degrees, where right is positive (also known as 'gamma' with 'Portrait' orientation)
gyroSensorTab.zAxis: z is the compass direction of the device in degrees (also known as 'alpha')
gyroSensorTab.zAxisNote: Note: Some devices don't support compass (the z value will always be 0). For some devices, the compass don't returns the angle with the north.

setAxisDialogFull.title: Set device orientation
setAxisDialogFull.message: Select the orientation of your device in order to have expected values. The default orientation is 'Portrait', in general it's when the power cord is at the bottom of your device.

videoSensorTab.addPoints: Click on the video to add objects to track
videoSensorTab.pointsNoMoreTracked: The object '__name__' has been lost, it will no more be tracked

errors.maximumTrackedPointsReached: The maximum number of object to track (__number__) has been reached
errors.videoAccessRefused: Error while accessing to the webcam

configureTrackedPointNameModal.title: Enter the name of the object to track

manageScriptFilesModal.title: Manage script files
manageScriptFilesModal.confirmScriptFileDeletion: Confirm you really want to delete '__filename__' ?

errors.cantRetrieveListOfScriptFiles: Can't retrieve the list of files. [__causedBy__]

ev3brick.confirmStopScriptAlreadyRunning: A script is already running, stop the script currently running and start the new script ?

errors.webSocketNotSupported: WebSocket not supported by your Browser. Please try with a recent version of your browser. If not possible, please consider installing Firefox.
errors.ev3ConnectionFailed: EV3 Brick connection failed. Connection will be retried in a few seconds. [__causedBy__]
errors.ev3ConnectionNok: EV3 Brick connection closed by the EV3 brick. Connection will be retried in a few seconds.
errors.cantRunScriptEV3ConnectionNok: Can't execute the script, the connection with the EV3 brick is down
errors.cantStopScriptEV3ConnectionNok: Can't stop the script, the connection with the EV3 brick is down

server.@comment: Translation for the stuff coming from the server/brick

errors.MESSAGE_FIELD_NOT_FOUND: Can't found field: '__field__' in parameter message
errors.SCRITP_LANGUAGE_NOT_SUPPORTED: Language: '__language__, isn't supported. Try JavaScript instead.
errors.UNKNOWN_ACTION: No processor registered for action name: '__action__'
errors.INVALID_SENSOR_PORT: Sensor port '__port__' isn't valid should be in [S1, S2, S3, S4] or [1, 2, 3, 4]
errors.INVALID_MOTOR_PORT: Motor port '__port__' isn't valid, should be in [A, B, C, D]
errors.INVALID_CHANNEL_VALUE: Invalid channel value: '__channel__', valid values in [1, 2, 3, 4]
errors.INVALID_NOTE: Invalid note: '__note__', should be in [C1-B7, # allowed on C, D, F, G, A] or [Do-Si, # allowed on Do, Re, Fa, Sol, La]
errors.SCRIPT_STOP_FORCED: Script forced to stop, please use "ev3.isOk()"
